mapper.update:

TEL=#{tel},
START_DATE=#{startDate},

WRONG_TYPE=#{wrongType},
SRC_ADDRESS=#{srcAddress},

COMPARE_DEST_ADDRESS=#{compareDestAddress},

LOST_PERCENT=#{lostPercent},
LAST_JUMP_OUT=#{lastJumpOut},
LAST_JUMP_IN=#{lastJumpIn},
EXCEP_IP=#{excepIp},
EXCEP_DIRECTION=#{excepDirection},
IS_RANK_ANALYSE=#{isRankAnalyse},

IP_RANGE=#{ipRange},
INTERFACE_PROBLEM=#{interfaceProblem},
BAD_IP=#{badIp},

PROBLEM_START_TIME=#{problemStartTime},
REAL_EXCEP_TYPE=#{realExcepType},
SOLVE_RESULT=#{solveResult},
OPERATION_TYPE=#{operationType},
OPERATION_TYPE_IMG=#{operationTypeImg},
MACHINA=#{machina},
CAOZGCS=#{caozgcs},

STATUS=#{status},

REMARK=#{remark},
DELETE_FLAG=#{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER=#{createUser},

MODIFY_DATE=#{modifyDate},
EXT_STR1=#{extStr1},

EXT_STR3=#{extStr3},
EXT_STR4=#{extStr4},
EXT_STR5=#{extStr5},
EXT_DATE1=#{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2=#{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1=#{extNum1},

MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
